Description: Penannular ear- or hair-ring: a cane of translucent pale-green glass, circular in section, has been drawn into a circle with open, sheared ends.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Pt. I, T. Eric Peet & C. Leonard Woolley ‘et al.’, ‘The City of Akhenaten. Excavations of 1921 and 1922 at el-‘Amarneh’, (London 1923), pl. XIII, 6.
